text: Þis is Wulfgates gecwide æt Dunnintune.

Þæt is þonne þæt he geann ærest Gode his sawelscættas, þæt is I hid æt Tærdebicgan & I pund penega & VI & twentig freotmonna for his sawle & into Wigeracæstre an bryþen mealtes healf of Dunnintune healf of Cylleshale & into sancte Æþelbrihte healfes pundes weorð & into sancte Guðlace healfes pundes weorð & into Leomynstre IIII aldhryðra & into Bromgearde I hryðer oðer into Cliftune & into Heantune IIII hryðra & to Pencric II hryðra & into Tweongan II hryðra.
& he geann forgifnesse ælcan þara þe wið hine agylt hæbbe for his sawle þearfe.
& he geann anes geares gafol his monnum to gyfe.
Swa heo þa are brucon swa heo þa ælmessan gelæstan þa ðer to londe foð.
& he geann his hlaforde II hors & II sweord & IIII scyldas & IIII spera & X mæran mid X coltan.
& he bit his hlaford for Godes lufan þæt he beo his wifes freond & his dohter.
& he ann his wife þæs landes æt Cylleshale & æt Eowniglade & æt Hrodene þa hwile hire dæg beo.
& ofer hire dæg ga þæt land eft in min cynn þa ðær nehste syn.

& Wulfgyfe minre dohter þæt land æt Dunnintune swa hit stont & æt þornbyrig þæt land þe wæs mid hire moder golde geboht æt Leofnoðe & Wulfgyfe suna mire dohter þæt land æt Ingewyrðe & Wilflede minre dohter þa oðre hide æt Tærdebicgan & Ælfilde mire magan þa hide beneoþan wuda eall swa wit on wedd gesealdon.
& gif ic lengc beo þonne heo þonne hæbbe ic þæt land æt Wrotteslea.
& ealle þa ðe to mire ahte fon gylde Brune XX mancses goldes.
& þa hors þa þe þær to hlafe beon mine wife & minre dohtran eallum gelice fela.
& þeo wellinc æt þære wic into Dunnintune.
& Æþelsige, leof, cyð þis mine hlaforde & ealle mine freondum.
